articles.title: Waymo taps Avis to manage robotaxi fleet in Dallas
articles.description: Avis will handle general depot operations, including charging and maintaining the vehicles. Users will be able to hail a robotaxi through the Waymo
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec

articles.description: The chatbot app, which is available in beta on iOS and Android, lets users access its AI model, Aristotle.

articles.title: Flexport sells former freight unicorn Convoy’s tech 2 years after buying it
articles.description: The assets of Convoy are now in the hands of DAT Freight & Analytics.

articles.title: Microsoft Edge is now an AI browser with launch of ‘Copilot Mode’

articles.title: Anthropic unveils new rate limits to curb Claude Code power users
articles.description: The new rate limits will go into effect August 28 for subscribers to Anthropic's $20-per-month Pro plan, as well as its $100- and $200-per-month Max
articles.author: Maxwell Zeff

articles.title: Amazon disputes report that it raised prices of popular items since Trump took office
articles.description: Amazon published a lengthy rebuttal to a WSJ report that found that Amazon prices had increased since Trump announced tariff plans.

articles.title: 20 national security experts urge Trump administration to restrict Nvidia H20 sales to China
articles.description: The letter states that allowing sales of the H20 AI chip to China could hurt the U.S.'s AI "edge" and worsen chip bottlenecks in the U.S.

articles.description: Russian prosecutor said it opened a criminal investigation into the cyberattack targeting Aeroflot, the largest airline in Russia.
